response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an opportunity that I believe could be of great value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you our premium product for $1,200,000. This price reflects the exceptional quality and unique features of the item, which I am confident will meet and exceed your expectations.

Given its worth to you, I am certain this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit significantly. If you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase, please let me know. I am more than happy to provide additional information or answer any questions you might have.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
